Multikicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flash
When Disciple of the Silent Mind enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each time Disciple of the Silent Mind was kicked.
flavor_text: [i]Through silence, they attain clarity. Through clarity, they attain strength.[/i]
